author: Ben Kesslen
title: 'Stop gathering... go home.' New Jersey city will use drones to enforce social distancing
description: A New Jersey city hard hit by the coronavirus will use drones to enforce the governor's orders that ban social gatherings and require residents to stay home except for essential business.
content:
A New Jersey city hard hit by the coronavirus will use drones to enforce the governor's stay-at-home order.
Elizabeth, a city of about 128,000 across the Hudson River from New York City, had 1,403 cases of coronavirus and 32 deaths as of Monday, according to… [+5378 chars]
